name: Rahul Ambala
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Innovative and results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 11 years of experience architecting scalable web applications and AI-driven systems using Node.js, Nest.js, and Python. Adept at integrating AI/ML pipelines, microservices, and automation workflows with React, Angular, Vue, and Next.js. Proven ability to deliver end-to-end cloud solutions leveraging AWS, GCP, and Azure, ensuring high availability, observability, and performance. Experienced in Agile, CI/CD automation, and cross-functional leadership, delivering measurable business outcomes.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Architected Node.js microservices for intelligent mail routing, integrated with Python FastAPI ML services for predictive anomaly detection, reducing operational delays by 35%.
Built AI/ML-assisted workflows using TensorFlow and XGBoost in Python, embedded into Node.js APIs, enhancing real-time content validation accuracy by 42%.
Designed event-driven architecture using Azure Service Bus, Kafka, and SignalR, coupled with React.js dashboards for real-time monitoring, increasing system observability by 60%.
Deployed distributed microservices on AKS and AWS ECS with automated CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps), achieving 99.99% deployment reliability with rollback automation.
Modernized legacy C# ASP.NET MVC and Node.js systems into microservices architecture, introducing dependency injection, async I/O, and DDD patterns, improving maintainability by 50%.
Led Agile sprints coordinating AI, data engineering, and backend teams, achieving 96% sprint completion accuracy while aligning with customer SLAs.
Mentored engineers in Node.js performance optimization, microservice observability, and API gateway design, accelerating adoption of cloud-native best practices.
Implemented monitoring and alerting with Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack, reducing incident response times by 40%.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Developed Node.js backend services powering high-traffic e-commerce platforms, using AWS Lambda, S3, and DynamoDB for serverless scalability, handling peak loads with 99.9% uptime.
Designed REST and GraphQL APIs for React.js and Angular SPAs, implementing JWT authentication, RBAC, and caching strategies, lowering response latency by 30%.
Built Next.js dashboards for real-time order tracking and analytics, integrated with Python ETL scripts and Node.js aggregation services, improving data availability and insights by 50%.
Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, integrating unit, integration, and load testing via Jest, Mocha, PyTest, and Locust, reducing deployment time by 45%.
Refactored monolithic Node.js and .NET apps into loosely coupled microservices with CQRS and event sourcing, improving scalability and fault tolerance.
Collaborated in Agile Scrum ceremonies, backlog grooming, sprint reviews, and stakeholder demos, mentoring junior engineers in cloud-native microservice design and Python automation integration.
Implemented centralized logging and monitoring with ELK Stack and Sentry, reducing critical system downtime by 35%.
Integrated Python scripts for data processing, AI/ML model inference, and automation tasks, streamlining workflows and improving operational efficiency.

experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Developed Node.js REST APIs and Python automation scripts for IoT telemetry ingestion, reducing downtime by 20% and improving data reliability by 40%.
Built AngularJS dashboards (2014–2016) powered by Node.js APIs and SQL Server, visualizing sensor data and production KPIs in real-time for plant engineers.
Integrated Python scripts for predictive maintenance, enabling early detection of machine faults and reducing unscheduled downtime by 15%.
Designed Azure-based ETL pipelines using Functions, Blob Storage, and Data Factory, automating nightly data processing and reducing manual effort by 70%.
Refactored legacy Node.js and .NET applications into modular microservices, enabling containerized deployment on Docker Swarm and faster CI/CD cycles.
Introduced Agile processes, sprint planning, and retrospectives to improve iteration speed, delivery quality, and team collaboration.
Implemented API versioning, caching, and authentication strategies, improving reliability and maintainability for large-scale IoT systems.
